title: Enchanting Emerald & Pearl Jhumka Earrings - A Timeless Treasure
materials: Cultured Pearl. Features a durable finish and meticulous setting of gemstones.
features: Classic Jhumka design with a delicate filigree pattern. The design is reminiscent of peacock feathers, a symbol of beauty and grace in South Indian culture. It uses a traditional design, while featuring a modern setting of the emeralds and pearls.
colors: and Gold. These colors complement each other beautifully and are often associated with prosperity and good fortune.
occasions: or any special occasion. Also suitable for modern parties and formal events where you want to add a touch of ethnic elegance. Ideal for Muhurtham
description: Timeless design blending traditional Jhumka styling with modern elegance. High-quality materials ensure lasting beauty. The emerald and pearl combination represents prosperity and purity. Handcrafted with great attention to detail, making each piece unique. It is lightweight and comfortable to wear.
